about_the_game:
Noodle Samurai is a top down action game about Reshi, a samurai monkey, turned chef. Reshi is forced to hack 'n' slash his way through a series of sentient ingredients and deliver them to the demon toad before he loses his patience and eats Reshi instead. In order to deliver the ingredients as fast as possible Reshi must use his wits and grappling hook to traverse the various arenas across the land.

  • Explore over 90 action packed levels.
  • Outplay your enemies with Reshi's dash and parry abilities.
  • Race against the clock to earn yourself a bronze, silver or gold medal.
  • Complete each level faster than your friends to secure your place at the top of the leaderboard.

Grapple Across Arenas!

Traverse the map with your grappling hook.

Collect Ingredients!

Battle the ingredients to collect them.

Feed Gluttonous Demons!

Deliver the ingredients you've collected to the Demon Toad.

short_description: You are a monkey samurai who has been captured by a gluttonous demon toad. Using your grapple hook you traverse arenas slaying dangerous ingredients with your trusty blade, cooking and serving them to the demon, lest you become the meal yourself.
